About Me

Few things about me...

BIO

I completed my graduation in 2018 from Dayananda Sagar College Of Engineering, Bangalore. I am now working as an Associate Software Engineer wherein I am responsible for front end development of projects. My short term goal is to become a full stack developer, I am devloping my skills constantly to become one. The reason why I love web development is because of the mere fact that I see my code turn into beautiful visuals.

Swayaan

Associate Software Engineer

I work on the front end development of projects and so far I have worked on three projects.The technologies I have used to create these projects are

  • HTML
  • CSS/SCSS
  • Bootstrap4
  • Javascript
  • Angular7
and other libraries.

GE HealthCare

Intern

I had an amazing opurtunity to intern at GE healthacare, where I learnt about various medical devices and the type of software required by such devices plus the hardware configurations. I was given training for interpersonal skills

Thrillophilia

Intern

Thrillophilia is a startup who deals in Curated Travel Experiences Across The Globe. I was part of the digital marketing team, where i learnt different techniques of digital marketing.
